Html:
Hi, the previous problem where the emulator would not close is fixed. Thanks for that.
I got a couple of questions regarding the skin and associated options.

The option "Use cutout skin" works. But what does the option "Use screen texture" do, actually?

The option "Use custom Skin" allows one to select a different bitmap (which I don't have and so I receive an error message) and select a different colour. Couldn't these be separated, where you continue to use the ROM bitmap OR select a different bitmap, and regardless choose your favourite colour AND/OR select "Cutout skin"? I noticed that when "Cutout skin" is disabled, the selection of colour works. Why not also with "Cutout"?

Cheers,
Stephan

Good to hear your first issue is fixed.

If you look closely at the lcd you'll notice that there is a shadow texture on it (which is pulled from the skin). If you uncheck use screen texture then it will draw the screen as is, without simulating the look of pixels on a real LCD. As for selecting a custom skin and selecting a different color, they are separate, however in cutout mode changing the skin color does not work. It did at one point, then it just stopped working. Its a long standing issue and unfortunately fixing it is not easy. I'm still searching for a solution, but I have not yet found a way to solve it.

Thanks for the explanation.
As to the 2nd topic: Don't worry about. Nice to have, low prio feature.
Cheers, Stephan
